The complexity of this view is considered medium due to the following factors:
It involves multiple inner joins across five tables, which increases the complexity of the SQL logic.
The view does not include subqueries or complex calculations, which keeps the complexity from being high.
The use of multiple join conditions and the potential for large datasets from the involved tables contribute to its medium complexity.
